criteria: Understanding and application of the commutative property (e.g., a x b = b x a).
Understanding and application of the associative property (e.g., (a x b) x c = a x (b x c)).
Understanding and application of the distributive property (e.g., a x (b + c) = (a x b) + (a x c)).
Using properties to simplify calculations and solve problems efficiently.
